alert.note: Alert for Coffey; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Coffey and east central Lyon Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neosho Rapids, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebo and Neosho Rapids. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 140 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
